classic_movies_1950_1980.title: The President's Plane Is Missing
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A political thriller about the mysterious disappearance of Air Force One with the President aboard.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Buddy Ebsen, Peter Graves, Arthur Kennedy

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: Night of the Living Dead
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A group of people trapped in a rural farmhouse fight for survival against hordes of cannibalistic zombies.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Duane Jones, Judith O'Dea, Karl Hardman

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: Carnival of Souls
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: After a car accident, a woman finds herself drawn to an abandoned carnival pavilion.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Candace Hilligoss, Frances Feist, Sidney Berger

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant that feeds on human blood.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Jonathan Haze, Jackie Joseph, Mel Welles

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating a doomsday weapon.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Gregory Walcott, Tom Keene, Mona McKinnon

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: Detour
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A musician hitchhikes to Hollywood and gets caught up in a web of murder and deceit.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Tom Neal, Ann Savage, Claudia Drake

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A hypnotist uses a somnambulist to commit murders in a German town.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Werner Krauss, Conrad Veidt, Friedrich Feher

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: Reefer Madness
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A propaganda film about the supposed dangers of marijuana use.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Dorothy Short, Kenneth Craig, Lillian Miles

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: The Terror
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: A French soldier encounters a mysterious woman and becomes involved with a baron's dark secrets.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Boris Karloff, Jack Nicholson, Sandra Knight

classic_movies_1950_1980.title: The Last Man on Earth
classic_movies_1950_1980.description: The sole survivor of a plague that has turned humanity into vampires struggles to survive.
classic_movies_1950_1980.cast_crew: Vincent Price, Franca Bettoia, Emma Danieli

metadata.description: Sample classic movies from 1950-1980 that are likely available on YouTube
metadata.notes: These movies are either in public domain or commonly available on YouTube
